text: Dai Tielang (; 17 October 1930 – 4 September 2019) was a Singaporean-born Chinese animator. He was best known for directing Black Cat Detective (1984–1987). He worked in Shanghai Animation Film Studio. His other works include Where is Mama (1960) and A Deer of Nine Colors (1981). Dai died on 4 September 2019 in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China of multiple organ failure at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== *Interview transcription *Historical Dictionary of Chinese Cinema *Hong Kong Movie Database - Mr. Black Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:Animators Category:Singaporean people Category:21st-century Chinese people
title: Dai Tielang
